title: Don Scott becomes first Black Speaker in Virginia Legislature's 400 year history
description: Del. Don Scott, a rising star among Virginia Democrats with a unique personal story, was voted in as speaker of the Virginia Statehouse.

title: Bringing birther back, Donald Trump questions Nikki Haley's right to be president
description: The former governor of South Carolina, Haley was born in the southern state. But as she surges in Republican polls, Trump is elevating false conspiracy theories about her citizenship on social media.

title: North Carolina man settles for millions after wrongful conviction, 44 years in prison
description: The settlement, which will end a wrongful incarceration lawsuit filed by attorneys for Ronnie Wallace Long, also included a public apology from the city of Concord for its role in his imprisonment.
